text: Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
author: Qur'an 2:153

text: So verily, with hardship, there is relief.
author: Qur'an 94:5

text: The strong is not the one who overcomes people by his strength, but the strong is the one who controls himself while angry.
author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Hadith, Bukhari & Muslim)

text: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak a good word or remain silent.
author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Hadith, Bukhari & Muslim)

text: Patience is of two kinds: patience over what pains you, and patience against what you covet.
author: Imam Ali (RA)

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

text: And He found you lost and guided you.
author: Qur'an 93:7

text: The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ (Hadith, Bukhari)
